content: I’ve had a similar interest in graphing my expenses and have cooked up some Python scripts to do a very similar job. The scripts are available on Github[1], and the README shows the graphs generated from some example input data. It’s all command-line driven so that might limit it’s audience, but I thought the types of graphs I created might interest you :) And if you have any feedback or suggestions on the graphs I’m interested in hearing it! [1] https://github.com/amboar/fpos
